answers.answer: Your doctor will let you know on your next doctor visit

They should have the results by tomorrow and then they will most likely call you immediately after they get them if anything is wrong. Unfortunately with Christmas coming up, if they don't get the results by tomorrow, it might be a few days but it will most likely be there by tomorrow.

question: How long does it take to find out the results of a 3 hour glucose test? I took mine this morning and I was wondering if I have gestational diabetes.
title: 3 Hour Glucose Test Result Question
